0.2.name: wordpress/wordpress-autosharepost
0.2.description:
About this Plugin

A wordpress plugin to automatically share posts via twitter and facebook with a CommentGrabber to grab all comments posted on a facebook post which is connected with a blog post. The Comment Grabber requires wp-cron to run as a real cronjob to work properly. See "Getting Started" under "Installation" to get more information.

Special Thanks

I want to thank all my colleageus at Checkdomain who supported me to create this Wordpress-Plugin
